item.title: How to secure nginx docker container
item.description: Goal Rootless mode Read only file system Linux Capabilities https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man7/capabilities.7.html Prepare conf file nginx.conf worker_processes 1; error_log /dev/stderr warn; pid /tmp/nginx.pid; events { worker_connections 1024; } http { include /etc/nginx/mime.types; default_type application/octet-stream; log_format main '$remote_addr $status $request_time "$request" ' '$body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" ' '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"'; access_log /dev/stdout main; sendfile on; keepalive_timeout 65; error_page 400 401 402 403 404 405 406 407 408 409 410 411 412 413 414 /error.
